description.value:
When you join this circle at 2nd level, you have formed a bond with a wildfire spirit, a primal being of creation and destruction. Your link with this spirit grants you access to some spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Circle of Wildfire Spells table.

Once you gain access to one of these spells, you always have it prepared, and it doesn't count against the number of spells you can prepare each day. If you gain access to a spell that doesn't appear on the Druid Spell List, the spell is nonetheless a druid spell for you.

Druid Level Spells
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.IIuDZLMheyrdIkDW]{Burning Hands}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.OxoWjq14lq0FE8tJ]{Cure Wounds}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Nkf2Stq9iJcEvO4A]{Flaming Sphere}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.brFqMN9eI91GFIhv]{Scorching Ray}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.5lZIyMdWRQZX4qwe]{Plant Growth}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.JfmldXrY61V0FQC2]{Revivify}
7th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.Er9z3iNVPGp4UA0Q]{Aura of Life}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.z5x0DaI0w9Zeu1BD]{Fire Shield}
9th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.T1B0j8lU67x3SccN]{Flame Strike}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.dbZeeLOESusVXxMJ]{Mass Cure Wounds}

Note: After adding the appropriate spells to your character, set their Preparation Mode to Always Prepared.
